texts.es: Jessica nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo , ella tiene 37 años y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos, ella es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo, ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza y comida entonces tiene una pequeña tienda donde expende sus productos, ella  pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario” desde hace varios años entonces en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, latas de leche, bolsas de fideos y botellas de aceite, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Jessica was born in the city of Paucartambo.  She’s 37-years-old and in a common law relationship.  She has four children.  She’s a hardworking, enterprising mother who supports her family by means of the effort she puts into her work.  

She works selling beer and food.  She has a small store where she sells her goods.  She’s been part of the “Virgen del Rosario” for many years and on this occasion needs the loan to buy supplies like sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, cans of milk, bags of noodles and bottles off oil.  She is grateful for and values the loan and commits to make her monthly payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Mirzomudin

texts.ru: Мирзомудин 45-летний фермер, проживающий в районе Кумсангир. У него есть жена и трое детей, которых он очень любит и он усердно работает, чтобы их обеспечивать. По словам Мирзомудина климат и погода района благоприятная для ведения сельского хозяйства. Он уже более 8 лет как занимается посевом сельскохозяйственной культуры и ни разу не жалел об этом. Миирзомудин на большом участке орошаемой земли выращивает хлопок для продажи. Сейчас он нуждается в кредите, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения и топливо. Он хочет получить высокий урожай хлопка и за счет прибыли расшить земледельческую деятельность.
texts.en:
Mirzomudin is a 45-year-old farmer, residing in the Qumsanqir region. He has a wife and three children, who he loves very much and he works hard to provide for them. 

According to Mirzomudin, the climate and weather are favorable for agriculture. For more than eight years, he has been involved in growing crops and has never regretted it. On a large plot of land, Mirzomudin grows cotton for sale. 

Now, he needs a loan in order to buy mineral fertilizers and fuel. He wants to get a high yield of cotton and due to the profit to broaden his agricultural activities.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and fuel for the cotton crop

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es: Guillermina nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo , ella tiene 42 años y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos, ella es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo, ella tiene  un restaurante y le va muy bien, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario” desde hace varios entonces en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo arroz, verduras, carne, fideos y otras cosas más, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Guillermina was born in the city of Paucartambo; she’s 42-years-old and in a common law relationship.  She has four children and she’s a hardworking, enterprising mother who supports her family by means of her efforts at work.  

She has a restaurant and she does very well.  She has belonged to the “Virgen del Rosario” communal bank for several and on this occasion needs the loan to buy supplies like rice, vegetables, meat, noodles and other things.  She is grateful for and values the loan and commits to make her monthly installment payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Замира жительница города Истаравшан, расположенный на севере Таджикистана. Ей 36 лет. Она независимая женщина, имеет собственный торговый бизнес. Замира замужем. У нее одна дочь и сын, учащиеся в школе. Ее муж в данное время находится за рубежом на заработках. Замира в универсальном магазине арендует торговую точку, где занимается продажей мебели. Она в основном продает спальные и кухонные гарнитуры, а также зеркала. Она в этой области уже 5 лет и получает с бизнеса хорошую прибыль, часть которую она тратит на обеспечение семьи и часть на продвижение бизнеса. Замира в месяц трижды закупает свой товар с города Худжанд и привозит на продажу только красивую, качественную и удобную мебель. Она работает в своем магазине 8 часов в день. С целью развития бизнеса Замира обратилась за кредитом. Она хочет закупить мебель и таким образом увеличить товарооборот.
texts.en:
Zamira is a resident of the town of Istaravshan, located in the north of Tajikistan. She is 36 years old. She is an independent woman and has her own retail business. 

Zamira is married. She has one daughter and son, studying in school. Her husband at the moment is working abroad. Zamira leases a retail space in the general store, where she sells furniture. She mainly sells bedroom and kitchen sets, as well as mirrors. She has been in this field for five years and receives a good profit from the business, part of which she spends on supporting the family and part on promoting the business. 

Three times a month, Zamira buys her good from the city of Khujand and brings for sale only beautiful, high-quality, and comfortable furniture. She works in her store eight hours per day. 

With the goal of developing the business, Zamira applied for a loan. She wants to buy furniture and in this way to expand inventory.

loans.use: to buy furniture in a store to develop her business

loans.name: Ikromjon

texts.ru:
Икромчон ответственный и усердный человек. Он проживает со своей семьей -  с женой, сыном, матерью и братом в городе Куляб в южной части Таджикистана. Ему 32 года. Сейчас у него нет работы. Икромчон хочет начать деятельность по предоставлению услуги такси. У него есть опыт работы в этой сфере, а  также сбережение в размере 900 долларов США. Икромчону не хватает еще немного денег, чтобы купить машину и начать деятельность. Поэтому он просит в кредит эту недостающую сумму. 
Икромчон планирует осуществлять свою деятельность по маршрутной линии города. Он собирается работать с 7:30 утра до 20:00 вечера и в день совершать 5 рейсов. Он будет выплачивать кредит за счет прибыли с деятельности.
texts.en:
Ikromjon is a responsible and hardworking person. He lives with his family -- his wife, son, mother, and brother -- in the town of Kulob in the southern part of Tajikistan. He is 32 years old. 

At the moment, he does not have a job. Ikromjon wants to start providing taxi services. He has work experience in this field, аs well as savings of USD $900. Ikromjon still needs a little money in order to buy a car and start activities. Therefore, he is asking for a loan for the missing amount.

Ikromjon plans to operate on the city transportation routes. He is going to work from 7:30 in the morning to 20:00 at night and to make five rounds per day. He will repay the loan from profit of his operations.

loans.use: to buy a car in order to start providing taxi services

loans.name: Irving Josue

texts.es:
Irving es un joven de 19 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de ica, la cual se caracteriza por su clima calido. Irving es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que dia a días se esfuerza mucho para poder llevar dinero para apoyar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar, es por ello que Irving trabaja como guardián y obrero en un fundo agrícola, el labora alrededor,  de 9 horas al día, con el fruto de su trabajo solventa sus gastos de estudio, ya que actualmente se encuentra cursando la carrera de administración; Irving cree que esta saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable.
Irving está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le estan brindando el podrá comprar una computadora, lo cual será útil para poder realizar sus trabajos de estudio, asi el podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Tener una profesión y poder apoyara a su familia”.
texts.en:
Irving, 19, is a young man living in the city of Ica which is noted for its hot weather.  Irving is a young man who very much wants to get ahead which is why he strives much every day to bring money to help his parents with household expenses.  Irving is employed as a guard and as a laborer on a large agricultural estate and works about 9 hours daily.  He’s able to pay for his education with the fruits of his labor.  He’s currently studying Business Administration and Irving believes he’s getting ahead because he’s very responsible.

Irving’s very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support they are giving him he will be able to buy a computer which will be very useful for him to do his school work and he will be able to continue striving to make his greatest dream reality: to have a profession and to be able to support his family.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Tattybubu

texts.ru: Таттыбубу 27 лет, замужем, детей нет. Образование - среднее, по специальности портниха. На протяжении 6 лет работала швеей в частном швейном цеху. С 2011 года Таттыбубу начала заниматься торговлей детской одежды, стартовав с суммой в 40,000 сом (KGS), Таттыбубу сумела развить свой бизнес с ежемесячным доходом в сумме около 14,000 сом (KGS). В целях расширения ассортимента товаров, Таттыбубу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS). Таттыбубу планирует вложить доходы от бизнеса в дальнейшее увеличение ассортимента товара, в товар хочет включить детскую обувь, а также в будущем хочет построить дом.
texts.en:
Tattybubu is 27 years old, married, and has no children. She has a secondary education with a specialty as a dressmaker. Over the course of six years, she worked as a seamstress in a private sewing workshop. 

In 2011, Tattybubu started to engage in retail of children's clothing, starting with a sum of 40,000 som (KGS). Tattybubu managed to develop her own business with a monthly income of about 14,000 som (KGS). 

With the aim of expanding her assortment of goods, Tattybubu turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS). 

Tattybubu plans to invest income from the business to further expand the assortment of goods, and wants to include children's shoes. In the future, she wants to build a home.

loans.use: to buy children's things for resale

loans.name: Midias

texts.en:
Midias is a 32-year-old married woman with three children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She teaches in a primary school. She depends entirely on her salary for income. She faces a challenge of limited income to look after her family. Her dream is to upgrade her studies and educate her children to attain degrees.
Midias intends to use the loan to pay for her school fees.

loans.use: to pay for her school fees.

loans.name: Sandy Diana

texts.es:
Sandy es una joven de 26 años de edad, la cual ha atravesado por momentos difíciles, sobre todo por la pérdida de sus padres, lo cual fue muy doloroso para ella y sobre todo porque era muy pequeña. Afortunadamente una de sus tías, la apoyado mucho y sobre todo le ha brindado mucho amor y cariño, es por ello que cada día Sandy se esfuerza mucho para salir adelante, tal es así que ella trabaja apoyando a su tía en la atención de una pequeña tienda y en la venta e golosinas a las afueras de un colegio de su ciudad, y por las tardes acude a su centro de estudios, ya que ella actualmente estudia la carrera de administración de empresas.

Sandy está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar solventar los gastos de su mensualidad y materiales de estudio, con lo cual la ayudara mucho par poder desempeñarse mejor, así ella seguirá luchando y sobre todo seguirá esforzándose en busca de hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y ser una gran profesional”.
texts.en:
Sandy, 26, is a young woman who has gone through some difficult moments, above all the loss of her parents, which was very painful for her above all because she was very little.  Fortunately, one of her aunts has supported her much and above all has provided much love and affection.  Because of this, Sandy strives much to get ahead, so much so that she helps her aunt in her small store and selling snacks outside her school since she’s currently studying business administration.

Sandy’s very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given her she’s been able to cover her monthly tuition costs and to buy study materials which will be of great help for her to develop better and continue striving to reach her greatest dream: to finish her career and be a great professional.

loans.use: to pay tuition and to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Izahura Twimukye Group

texts.en:
Francis is 28 years old and married with four children. Three of the children attend school and he pays their tuition. He is into agriculture, growing crops and buying agricultural produce, mainly cassava, maize and beans, as his major source of income.

Francis wants a loan of 500,000 UGX (Five hundred thousand shillings) for his farming projects, most especially clearing the bush so that he can prepare for new season of planting maize and beans. His dream is to expand his agricultural business to a commercial level so that he can realize more returns.

Francis' major challenges include limited capital, changing weather conditions as well as the price fluctuation for his produce on the market.

loans.use: To hire labor for clearing the land

loans.name: Javier De Jesús

texts.es: Javier a sus 31 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos. Actualmente se dedica a trabajar como agricultor en una finca, ubicada en el pueblo donde reside. Desde hace 2 años, alterna su labor en la finca, con la cría y engorde de cerdos y con la producción de leche ya que posee lechones y vacas lecheras, el producto que saca diariamente, lo vende en el mercado del pueblo; con estas actividades, Javier obtiene los recursos suficientes para el sustento propio y el de su madre, quien vive sola en otra vereda. El titular es un hombre trabajador, emprendedor, muy activo y juicioso con sus labores, esto lo motivó a solicitar el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de 10 lechones (cría de cerdos) y concentrado (cuido para animales) con el fin de continuar con su negocio y lograr poco a poco tener una producción escalonada, para tener mejor rentabilidad en su negocio y, de esta manera aumentar sus ingresos para poder seguir apoyando económicamente a su madre. Además, desea cumplir el sueño de tener su propia finca para tener sus animales y sus propios cultivos y no depender de ninguna otra persona, así podrá ofrecerle mejores condiciones de vida a su madre y un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Javier, 31, is single and has no children.  He currently works as a laborer on a farm located in the town where he lives.  For the last two years he’s been alternating his job on the farm with raising and fattening up pigs and with producing milk since he owns piglets and dairy cows.  He sells the product he gets daily in the town market.  Javier earns sufficient resources from these activities for his own support as well as for his mother’s who lives alone in a different are.

Javier is a hardworking, enterprising, very active man who is sensible with his work which motivated him to request the loan to buy ten piglets (pig raising) and concentrate (animal feed) in order to continue with his business and gradually obtain staggered production to make his business more profitable thus increasing his income to continue supporting his mother economically.  Also, he wants to reach his dream of owning a farm of his own to raise his animals and his own crops and not be dependent on anyone else thus being able to offer better living conditions and improved well-being for his mother

loans.use: to buy ten piglets and feed.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en: Hasan is a 25-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife who works as a teacher at a local school. He has worked independently since 2010 in the construction field specializing in cement and concrete functions. In order to proceed with his transportation to projects, Hasan is requesting today to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to repair his van. His only target is to satisfy his customer’s demands and he plans to also expand geographically his industry with the aim of earning superior income and living in better conditions, especially since he is planning to have a baby soon.

loans.use: to repair his van.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is married with four children, and three go to school. She also takes care of additional family members. She is a poultry farmer. She operates her business on a wholesale basis from home. She has been in business for the last 18 years. She works seven days a week. She has requested 1,200,000 shillings from MCDT – SACCO to buy poultry feed, vaccines and feeding utensils. Her major challenge is seasonality and transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to buy a plot of land so as to expand her farming business. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include medication and school fees.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed and vaccines.

loans.name: Sabah

texts.en: Sabah is a 43-year-old Lebanese married woman from Lebanon. She is living with her husband and four children, who are attending school. Her husband who works as a plumber and student driver, and is the main income source of the family. As for her, she has been working as a tailor since 1995 proficiently and skillfully. Today, Sabah is willing to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase tailoring tools and supplies such as textiles, scissors and needles etc. She is certain that with the loan help, her productivity will increase, as well as her income. Regarding her future plans, Sabah states that she is thinking of borrowing more Kiva loan as she wants to open her own tailoring factory as soon as possible.

loans.use: purchase tailoring tools and supplies such as textiles, scissors and needles

loans.name: Violet

texts.en: Violet is a 47-year-old married woman with seven children living in Kasese, Uganda. She is a farmer who grows bananas for commercial purposes but also has a clothing business. With the proceeds, she has been able to buy more land to expand her plantation. As is every responsible mother's dream, Violet desires to educate her children up to university level and see them graduate with degrees. She says that her plantation is not sufficient to supply her increasing customer base and her plan is to buy from other farmers so as to maintain her customers.Violet intends to use the loan to buy bananas to sell.

loans.use: to buy bananas to sell.

loans.name: Talal

texts.en:
Talal is 47 years old from Gaza. He is married and has four children, three attending school.
Talal has owned a poultry farm since May 2010 and has one employee.
He has asked Ryada for this loan in order to buy feed and drinking pots and to enlarge his farm.
He hopes that this loan will help him develop his business and thus be able to provide his children with a better lifestyle and education.

loans.use: to buy feed and drinking pots and to enlarge his farm

loans.name: Damius

texts.en: Damius is a 37-year-old married man living in Kasese, Uganda. He is into the agriculture sector but also earns a salary as additional income. He started a business to improve his standard of living and his dreams are to venture into commercialized agriculture and educate his children up to the university despite drought and floods, which are his challenges. Damius intends to use the loan to pay workers who are preparing the garden for the next planting season.

loans.use: to pay workers who are preparing the garden for the next planting season.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es: Jaime, con 50 años de edad, es casado y tiene 5 hijos. Toda su vida la ha pasado en el campo, donde aprendió las actividades agropecuarias gracias a las enseñanzas de su padre. Actualmente se dedica a la actividad agrícola, pues posee cultivos de arveja, fríjol, papa y maíz; para conseguir los recursos económicos, él vende las cosechas en la plaza del pueblo donde reside; de esta forma ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos y a su esposa. Jaime es un señor  muy activo, luchador, pujante y apasionado por su familia y su labor, siempre va en busca de opciones que le permitan progresar. Por esto solicita el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de 5 novillones (ganado de levante), ya que desea alternar su actividad actual de agricultor, con la ganadería de levante, para lo cual ya arrendó un lote; esto le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos para continuar sustentando las necesidades básicas de su hogar. Además podrá seguir avanzando hacia el cumplimiento de su mayor sueño que es comprar un potrero para continuar con esta actividad y así ahorrarse el dinero que paga por el arriendo para invertirlo en sus negocios, así, en un futuro cercano, podrá brindar mejor calidad de vida a su familia y dar la oportunidad a sus hijos de tener una excelente educación.
texts.en:
Jaime, 50, is married with five children. He’s spent his entire life in the countryside where he learned agriculture and animal husbandry activities from his father.  He currently works in agriculture growing peas, beans, potatoes and corn.  To earn income he sells his crops in the town square where he lives.  In this way he’s succeeded in moving his children and wife forward.  

Jaime is a very hardworking, active, driven man who is passionate about his family and his work.  He’s always in search of options that will lead to progress.  Because of this, he’s requested a loan to buy five calves (cattle-raising) because he wants to alternate cattle-raising with his current agricultural work.  He’s already leased a lot to do so.  

This will allow him to earn higher income to continue meeting his household needs.  He’ll also be able to continue advancing towards reaching his greatest dream which is to buy pasture land to continue with this activity and save what he currently pays to lease it for his businesses.  Thus, in the near future he’ll be able to improve his family’s quality of life and to give his children the opportunity of having an excellent education.

loans.use: to buy five calves.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en: Marie is 40 years old and lives in Logan Town, one of the early communities in Liberia that is well-known. She is married and has five children between the ages of 18 and 20; only one is presently in school and lives at home. She did not go to school. For the past 10 years, she has been running a shop where she sells soft drinks, fry sausage, plantains, fish, etc. She started this business with money from her husband's earnings. She managed to establish this business, and learned ways of selling from her friends. She is very happy with her business because she meets new people every day and it keeps her busy. Most interestingly, she learned those different kinds of local languages. She is requesting a loan to buy soft drinks, fry sausage, plantains, fish, etc. for her business. Her plan is to build a decent house for her and her children.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, fry sausage, plantains, fish, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael is 29 years old and married to Chepkemoi, who raises poultry. They have been blessed with three children, ages 2, 4 and 8. He has a retail shop and also does motorcycle transportation. He has been in this business for 11 years and earns a monthly income of KES 10000.

Michael is borrowing KES 30000 to purchase sugar, cooking fat and sweets for his retail shop.

Michael plans to save the profit from the business.This is his first loan.

loans.use: To add stock to his retail shop.

loans.name: Héctor Wellington

texts.es: El cliente vive en el sector de Isla Trinitaria en Guayaquil.  Desde muy joven trabajó con su padre en el oficio de la construcción y siempre le gustó esta actividad.  Su trabajo consiste en aceptar obras de construcción con las cuales maneja el contrato de obreros para ésta.  Es casado y su esposa se dedica a las labores de la casa.  Tiene 2 hijos, uno de 25 años y otro de 16, quien asiste al colegio.   Por ahora necesita el dinero para comprar una computadora que le ayude a su hijo.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in the Isla Trinitaria sector of Guayaquil. He has worked in the construction trade with his father from a very young age, so he has always enjoyed this type of business. His work consists of accepting construction jobs and managing the contract workers who complete them.

The borrower is married and his wife takes care of the household duties. They have two sons, a 25-year-old and a 16-year-old who is in high school. For now, the borrower is need of money so that he can buy a computer that would help his son.

loans.use: to buy a computer for his son.

loans.name: Helber

texts.es: Helber, a sus 28 años de edad es casado y padre de un hijo de 7 años. Nació y creció en el campo donde aprendió de su padre todas las tareas agrícolas; gracias a ello, hoy en día posee cultivos de arveja, fríjol y curuba en una parcela que es propiedad de su suegro, cuya cosecha es vendida en el mercado del pueblo donde reside y, con esto obtiene los recursos para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. Helber es un hombre activo, dinámico, trabajador y entregado a su labor y a su familia, quien es su principal motivación para salir adelante; por esto solicita el apoyo del segundo ciclo de crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas al por mayor (abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes, fungicidas) con el fin de darle continuidad al cuidado de sus cultivos y poder cosechar productos de muy buena calidad, que permita venderlos a un mejor precio en el mercado; de esta forma podrá aumentar sus ingresos para sostener a su familia y avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su principal objetivo a mediano plazo, que es tener una parcela propia para cultivar más productos y así aumentar sus ingresos, para que le permita ofrecer una mejor educación a su hijo y brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Helber, 28, is married and father of a 7-year-old son.  He was born and grew up in the countryside where he learned all the agricultural tasks from his father.  Thanks to this he now has pea, beans and banana passion fruit crops on a parcel that belongs to his father-in-law.  He sells the crops in the local market and earns income this way for his home’s daily sustenance.

Helber is an active, dynamic, hardworking man who is devoted to his work and to his family who is his main motivation for getting ahead.  Because of this he’s asking for support in his second loan cycle in order to invest it in the purchase of agricultural supplies (manure, pesticide, fertilizer, fungicide) at wholesale in order to provide crop care and be able to harvest very good quality products that will allow him to sell them at a better market price.  In this way he’ll increase income to support his family and advance towards reaching his medium run goal of owning his own parcel of land to grow more products and increase his income so that he can provide better education for his son and provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
Irene es divorciada y tiene dos hijos. La familia tiene domicilio propio en la ciudad de La Paz.
Irene trabaja como secretaria en una Institución donde percibe un sueldo con el cual mantiene a su familia y puede cubrir sus mínimas necesidades. Necesita crédito para terminar de equipar su baño y que este posea obra fina, todo con el fin de darle comodidad a sus hijos y a su madre que vive con ellos.

Es la primera vez que solicita crédito en IMPRO y la primera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en: Irene’s divorced and has two children.  The family has a house of their own in the city of La Paz.  Irene works as a secretary in an institution where she earns a salary that she supports her family with and is able to meet basic needs.  She needs credit to finish equipping her bathroom so that it can be nicely finished.  All of this is aimed at giving her children and her mother who lives with them comfort.  This is her first loan with IMPRO and with KIVA.

loans.use: to equip her bathroom at home.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es:
Trinidad esta separada y tiene dos hijos, ella tiene casa propia en la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente se dedica a la elaboración de papas fritas y con ayuda de su hermana y su madre las comercializa en la ciudad de El Alto dejando en las tiendas zona por zona y con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, estudios y pago de servicios básicos de su familia.
Necesita crédito para comprar un motor para una volqueta que adquirió recientemente y necesita trabajos de reparación. Trinidad desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia
texts.en: Trinidad’s separated and has two children; she owns a house in the city of La Paz.  She currently works making fried potatoes and with help from her sister and her mother sells them in the city of El Alto to stores zone my zone.  With the little she earns she’s able to cover her family’s food, education and basic utility costs.  She needs the loan to buy an engine for a dump truck she acquired recently that needs repair.  Trinidad wants to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy an engine for her vehicle.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge, de 50 años de edad, está divorciado de la madre de sus hijos quienes ya son independientes, habitando cómodamente  su propia casa. Jorge se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles para eso cuenta con una tienda instalada en su hogar, desde donde atiende a su clientes que en su mayoría son sus vecinos a quienes atiende de manera amable y cordial ganándose así su preferencia.Le gusta su negocio pues le permite   estar en casa y contar con la tranquilidad de un ingreso económico, además del tiempo libre que lo puede emplear en el cuidado de su hogar.Viendo los buenos resultados  tiene planes de seguir creciendo y ampliar su negocio. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva, se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Con el monto solicitado de 1200 nuevos soles, comprará productos comestibles tales como arroz, leche, harina, conservas de pescado entre otros.
texts.en:
Jorge, 50, is divorced from his children’s mother; they are all independent now.  He lives comfortably in his own house.  Jorge works selling food items and has a home-based store to do so.  He tends to customers, who for the most part are his neighbors, cordially and kindly there thus winning them over.  He likes his business very much because it allows him to stay home and to have the peace of mind of having a source of income.  Also, the free time that he can use to care for his home.

Seeing the good results he’s having he plans to continue growing and expanding the business.  This is his first Kiva loan and he’s grateful for the financial support he’s getting to continue forward; he commits to make his payments punctually.  He will use the requested 1,200 new soles to buy food items like rice, milk, flour, canned fish, etc.

loans.use: to buy food items.

loans.name: San Judas Tadeo Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “San Judas Tadeo” conformada por 09 socios entusiastas y responsables que buscan cada día mejorar. Ricardina de 58 años es casada con 03 hijos independientes. Ricardina se dedica hace más de 10 años a la venta de productos de primera necesidad. Este negocio comenzó con la idea de contar con un negocio propio y de esta manera generar ingresos para su hogar. Aparte alquila cuartos de donde obtiene un ingreso extra. Se siente feliz pues gracias a su esfuerzo ha mejorado su vivienda. Más adelante le gustaría implementar su bodega. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de abarrotes y bebidas. El grupo “San Judas Tadeo” agradecen el crédito brindado y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Ricardina se encuentra sentada es la primera del lado derecho y viste chaleco negro.
texts.en:
The group called “San Judas Tadeo” consists of nine enthusiastic and responsible members who are looking to improve each day.

Ricardina is 58 years old, married, and has three children who are independent. She has been selling basic necessity products for more than 10 years. This business started out as an idea because she wants to generate income for her household, so she thought about having her own business. In addition, she rents out rooms in order to generate extra income. Ricardina is pleased because she has been able to make improvements to her home as a result of her efforts. Going forward, she would like to keep her store in operation. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy groceries and beverages.

The group “San Judas Tadeo” is grateful for the loan that has been provided. They promise to continue their good work. In the photo, Ricardina is seated on the right side and wearing a black vest.

loans.use: to buy groceries and beverages.

loans.name: Fresia

texts.es:
Fresia es soltera, es madre de un hijo y  estudia en la Universidad. Ella y su hijo viven en casa de familiares ocupando solo dos habitaciones. 
Actualmente trabaja por más de ocho horas en una empresa privada y con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia.
Necesita crédito para el pago de la universidad por que sus ingresos son muy bajos y no le alcanzan.
El sueño de Fresia, es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Fresia is single, has a son, and studies at the university. She and her son live in the house of relatives, occupying only two rooms.
Currently she works for more than eight hours at a private company, and with what little she earns she has to cover the costs of food, education, and basic utilities for her family.
She needs a loan to pay for university because her income is very small and she doesn’t have enough.
Fresia’s dream is to improve her family’s quality of life.
This is the first time she has requested a loan from IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita es una mujer casada, vive con su esposo y su hijo en la ciudad de La Paz. Actualmente Margarita se dedica a labores de albañilería debido a que esta actividad es más productiva que su anterior empleo, en más de una ocasión ha trabajado junto a su marido. Aprovechando eso, ella y su marido necesitan crédito para construir otra habitación en su domicilio, de esa manera la familia tendrá mayor comodidad y mejorará su calidad de vida
texts.en: Margarita’s a married woman living with her husband and son in the city of La Paz.  Currently, Margarita works in construction because this activity is more profitable than her previous job; on more than one occasion she’s worked alongside her husband.  Taking advantage of this, she and her husband need a loan to build another room at home so that the family will have more comfort and improved quality of life.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga esta separada, tiene dos hijos y tiene domicilio propio en la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja como policía donde percibe un sueldo que le alcanza para cubrir sus necesidades. Necesita crédito para terminar el acabado de su vivienda para dar comodidad a sus hijos ya que todos duermen en una habitación y es necesario que mejoren su calidad de vida.

Es la Primera vez que solicita crédito en IMPRO y la primera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en: Olga’s separated and has two children; she has a house of her own in the city of La Paz.  She’s currently employed as a police officer and earns a salary that’s sufficient to cover her needs.  She needs credit to finish her house to provide comfort for her children; they all sleep in one room at present and it’s necessary to improve their quality of life.  This is her first loan request from IMPRO and first from KIVA.

loans.use: to finish building her house.

loans.name: Virgen De La Puerta Group

texts.es: El grupo “VIRGEN DE LA PUERTA”  está conformado por 8 socios trabajadores. Quienes se encuentra pasando el 10 ciclo. Milagros tiene 43 años es casada con dos hijos aun educando. Hace 3 años implemento su bodega en su vivienda con la finalidad de apoyar a su esposo con los gastos familiares. Y a la vez vende productos de belleza por motivación de su esposo con la finalidad de mejorar su economía familiar. Las ganancias que obtiene lo invierte en los útiles escolares de sus hijos y en seguir implementando su negocio. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de una exhibidora para sus productos de belleza y más productos de primera necesidad. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Milagros es la segunda del lado izquierdo viste chompa negra.
texts.en: The "Virgen de la Puerta" has eight enterprising members who are now on their tenth cycle.  Milagros is 43 years old: she is married and has two children.  Three years ago she opened a small grocery store in her home, with the aim of supporting her husband with household costs.  In addition to groceries, Milagros' husband encouraged her to start selling beauty products in order to improve the family's financial situation.  She uses her profits to buy school materials for her children and to continue investing in her business.  This loan will be used to purchase a display case for the beauty products, and to buy staple foods.  The group is grateful to Kiva investors for the support provided.  In the photo, Milagros appears second on the left, wearing a black jumper.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil and a display case.

loans.name: Olga Graciela

texts.es: La cliente reside en la ciudad de Machala.  Empezó tiempo atrás, vendiendo colas y aguas.  En aquel entonces, su esposo trabajaba con banano y realizó un crédito, con el cual pudieron montar una pequeña tienda.  Debido a que él ya se jubiló, ahora trabajan juntos atendiendo el negocio.  Tienen 50 años de casados y se distribuyen el trabajo en la tienda, él elabora pan y ella se dedica a vender, generalmente durante la mañana.  Todos sus hijos con mayores de edad y son casados.  Necesita el dinero para la compra de abarrotes y confitería para su tienda.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in the city of Machala. Some time ago, she began selling sodas and water. At the time, her husband worked with bananas and applied for a loan that was used to establish a small store. He has retired since then, so now they work together by managing this business. They have been married for 50 years and divide the work in the shop. Her husband bakes bread and she is in charge of making sales, generally in the mornings. All of their children are grown and married.

The borrower needs money so that she can buy groceries and candy for her store.

loans.use: to buy groceries and candy to sell in her store.

loans.name: Dúo Solidario Chimaltecas Group

texts.es:
La señora Gloria Elizabet de treinta y siete (37) años de edad, es casada y tiene  cuatros  hijos todos menores de edad, desde hace dos (2) años posee una venta de refacciones en la Escuela Pedro Molina, que a base de esfuerzos logro establecer y mejorar su vivienda, a través de su negocio ella  ha mantenido y  a sacado a delante a su familia. 
El sueño de doña Gloria es poder mejorar la calidad de su vida y la de su familia a través del microcrédito que está solicitando a FAPE / kiva; con el préstamos quiere comprar producto especialmente invertir para la compra de los insumos que necesita para su venta de refacciones y espera contar con su apoyo para seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Gloria Elizabet, 37, is married and has four children still under her care.  For the past two years she has had a stall selling snacks in Escuela Pedro Molina.  Through her efforts she has been able to establish and improve her home. Through her work she has supported her family and provided them with a better life.

Her dream is to be able to raise her family's standard of living with the help of the loan she is seeking through FAPE and Kiva.  With the proceeds she wants to purchase products, and she especially wants to invest in the ingredients she needs so that the can sell her snacks.  She hopes that she can have your support so that she can keep growing her business.

loans.use: to purchase supplies so that she can make snacks to sell.

loans.name: Sulma Patricia

texts.es: Sulma es madre de dos pequeños hijos de 12 y 3 años y medio de edad, la mayor asiste a la escuela, por lo que Sulma trabaja muy duro como empleada doméstica para poder brindarle toda la ayuda necesaria a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Él trabaja como albañil, un trabajo humilde y no muy bien pagado, pero con lo que logran salir adelante. Debido a que el lugar en el que Sulma y su familia residen es una zona rural muy alejada de otras zonas industrializadas y más desarrolladas, no cuenta con agua potable, lo que la obliga a ella y su hija mayor a ir cada mañana a un chorro público para llevar el líquido vital hasta su hogar. Es por esta razón que Sulma solicita un préstamo para poder contar con el monto necesario para pagar el derecho de conexión de agua potable en su casa de habitación y de esta forma darle la oportunidad de una vida más tranquila para su familia, sobre todo para su hija quien antes de ir a estudiar debe cargar cántaros llenos de agua a diario y que gracias a este préstamo no tendrá que hacerlo más.
texts.en:
Sulma is the mother of two young children aged 3 and 12. The older child attends school.  Sulma works very hard as a domestic employee to do everything she can to help with the household expenses, along with her husband.  He works as a bricklayer, which is very humble work that is not well-paid, but it can nevertheless help them to get ahead.

Since the area where Sulma and her family live is very rural and far from other more industrialized and developed zones, they do not have potable water in their home.  As a result, she and her daughter have to go every morning to a public well to bring the water to their house.  

It is for this reason that Sulma is seeking a loan.  She will use the funds to have potable water connected to their home.  That will help her family to have a less stressful life.  This is most of all for her daughter, who has to carry home containers full of water every day before she goes to school.  Thanks to this loan she will no longer have to do this.

loans.use: to bring potable water to her home.

loans.name: Mercedes De María

texts.es: Mercedes es una joven trabajadora y llena de ilusiones metas para su futuro, vive junto a su madre y hermanos, ella es la mayor de todos por lo que es quien trabaja para ayudar a su madre con los gastos del hogar. Mercedes se dedica a la cosmetología, realizando cortes de pelo, tintes, uñas acrílicas entre otros servicios que realiza a domicilio con amigos y vecinos.  Mercedes solicita un préstamo para poder contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de materiales de construcción como: ladrillos, arena, cemento, hierro, piso y otros más para poder construir una letrina en su casa de habitación, ya que con la que cuentan actualmente ya es obsoleta y urge una nueva. Mercedes desea poder ayudar a su madre con este proyecto tan necesario para ella y su familia, ya que podrán contar con ambiente más sano y saludable para todos.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a hardworking young woman who is full of hope and goals for her future. She lives with her mother and her siblings.  She is the oldest of them all, so she is the one who works to help her mother with the household expenses.  She works as a beautician, doing haircuts and dyeing, as well as working on nails and other services.  She does this work from her home for friends and neighbors.  

She is seeking a loan so that she can purchase construction materials such as bricks, sand, cement, steel, and flooring.  She will use these materials to build a bathroom in her home, since her current bathroom is obsolete and a new one is needed.

Mercedes wants to be able to help her mother with this project that she and her family need very much.  This will result in a cleaner and healthier environment for everyone.

loans.use: to build a bathroom in her home.

loans.name: Lita

texts.es: Lita, de 33 años de edad, está casada con Arquímedes quien es obrero y padre de sus 2 hijos de 14  y 08 años de edad respectivamente con quienes vive en su casa propia. Lita se dedica a la venta de pescado fresco que compra por las madrugadas en el puerto más cercano y lo lleva a su puesto de venta en el mercado de su localidad, donde atiende muy bien a sus clientes entregándoles los mejores ejemplares frescos. Se inició hace más de 05 años como ayudante en los botes pesqueros del puerto de su localidad, luego con un capital propio se decidió a empezar con su propio negocio dedicándose a la venta de pescados. Antes de empezar con su negocio, sus ingresos como ayudante no le alcanzaban para los gastos de su hogar, viendo esta dificultad se decidió a cambiar. Ahora ve que sigue teniendo buenos resultados y tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y realizar envíos a  otras ciudades de su producto en mayor cantidad. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de 500 nuevos soles comprará pescado al por mayor para enviar a otras ciudades en donde requieren de estos productos.
texts.en:
Lita is 33 and married to Arquímedes who is a laborer and father of their two children ages 14 and 8, with whom she lives in their own house. She sells fresh fish that she buys in the early mornings at the nearest port and takes to her stand in the local market. There she serves her customers very well, providing them with the best fresh specimens. 

She started more than five years ago as a helper on the fish boats in the local port, then with her own working capital she decided to start her own business selling fish. Before starting her business, her income as a helper was not enough for the household expenses. Seeing this problem, she decided to make a change. Now she sees that she continues having good results and plans to expand her business and ship her product to other cities in greater quantity.

This is her first loan with Kiva and she feels grateful for the financial help she is receiving so that she can succeed.  In addition, she promises to make her installment payments on time. With the amount requested of 500 nuevos soles, she will buy fish at wholesale to send to other cities where they require these products.

loans.use: To buy fish at wholesale.

loans.name: Lethy

texts.es: Lethy, de 33 años de edad, está casada con Icler y tiene 02 hijos de 12 y 10 años de edad respectivamente con quienes vive en su casa propia. Lethy se dedica a alquilar su unidad de transporte público, el cual lo adquirió con ayuda de su esposo. Se inició hace más de 03 años y se siente contenta con está actividad ya que recibe muy buenos ingresos económicos. Se decido empezar con su negocio por el deseo de contar con sus propios ingresos y apoyar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar. Por tanto, viendo los resultados de su actividad, tiene deseos de continuar y aumentar su número de unidades vehiculares. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles, comprará repuestos para su mototaxi como llantas, asientos, entre otros.
texts.en: Lethy is 33 years old and has two children aged 10 and 12 with her husband Icler. They live in their own home. Lethy has a business renting out a mototaxi, which she bought with the help of her husband. She started over three years ago and is very satisfied with this activity since it provides very good income. She decided to start her business so that she could have her own income and support her husband with the household expenses. Seeing the results of her work, she wishes to continue and to acquire more vehicles. This is her first loan with Kiva, and she is grateful for the financial support so that she can keep moving forward. She promises to make her loan repayments on a punctual basis. With the requested amount of 800 nuevos soles, she will buy parts for her mototaxi, such as tires, seats and other items.

loans.use: to buy parts for her mototaxi, such as tires and seats.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.es:
Eusebio  trabaja como panadero, su  nivel de educacion es de primaria,vive en casa propia, ocupa una habitacion de acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento en la zona de las lomas de la ciudad de La Paz.

Eusebio tiene una jornada diaria de mas de 12 horas al dia, para cubrir los gastos de agua, luz y educacion  de su familia.

Necesita  crédito para la obra fina o acabado  de un cuarto, comprara estuco, puerta, pintura y ventanas , asi mejorarra  su calidad de vida.

El sueño de Eusebio es terminar de construir su casa para ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Eusebio works as a baker.  He has a basic level of education and lives in his home.  He lives in a brick home with a cement floor in the district of Las Lomas in the city of La Paz. He works more than twelve hours each day in order to cover costs such as water, light, and the education of his family.

He requires a loan so that he can finish the work on a room in his home.  He will purchase stucco, paint, doors and windows.  This will improve the quality of his life.  His dream is to finish the construction of his home so that he can provide a better life for his children.

loans.use: to purchase stucco, paints, doors and windows for his home.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en una casa en anticretico ocupando tres habitaciones, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona de Miraflores de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja como conductor en un programa y con lo que gana debe cubrir sus gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos.
El crédito lo requiere para capital de trabajo ya que desea invertirlo en el negocio de venta de hamburguesas por las noches para mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Alfredo es tener su negocio de hamburguesas para atender por las noches y por el día estudiar marketing o comunicación ya que tiene bastante experiencia en esa área.
texts.en:
Alfredo is single and has no children. He lives in a house under an antichresis arrangement (in which the occupant pays the owner a fixed sum at the start of tenancy that is returned at the end) occupying three rooms. The house is located in the Miraflores area of the city of La Paz.

Currently he works as a presenter on a program, and he must cover the cost of food and basic services with what he earns.

He needs the loan for working capital, since he wants to invest it in a business selling hamburgers at night in order to improve his income and his quality of life.

Alfredo's dream is to have his hamburger business to look after at night and to study marketing or communication during the day, since he has quite a bit of experience in that area.

loans.use: to invest in a fast food business (hamburgers)

loans.name: Llisela

texts.es:
Llisela, de 32 años de edad, está divorciada del padre de sus 3 hijos de 15,11 y 04 años de edad respectivamente con quienes vive en su casa propia. Llisela se dedica a la confección de ropa , el cual aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional. Se inicio con una sola máquina pero en la actualidad cuenta con más de 03 máquinas de coser para dar diferentes acabados a sus prendas brindando así trabajos bien realizados a sus clientes. Esta actividad la realiza en su hogar, a donde llegan sus clientes y los atiende amablemente. De decidió a empezar con su negocio ya que dejo su empleo y necesitaba de un oficio para generase sus ingresos económicos, además de la solicitud de sus vecinas al ver sus buenos acabados en la costura.
Este será su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente muy agradecida del apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante. Con el monto solicitado de 1300 nuevos soles comprará materiales de costura como telas, hilos, elásticos y otros para así aumentar su producción.
texts.en:
Llisela, is 32 years old and divorced from the father of her three children, ages 15, 11 and 4, with whom she lives in her own house. She makes clothing, which she learned to do by studying at an occupational education center. She started with just one machine, but now has more than three sewing machines to do various types of finishing work on her articles of clothing, offering high quality work to her customers. 

She carries on this business in her home, where her customers come and she serves them in a friendly way. She decided to start a business, as she left her job and needed an occupation to generate income. In addition there was demand from her neighbors on seeing the fine finishing work in her sewing.

This will be her first loan with Kiva and she feels grateful for the financial assistance she is receiving to move forward. With the amount requested of 1300 nuevos soles, she will buy sewing materials such as fabric, thread, elastics and other items so that she can increase her output.

loans.use: To buy sewing materials such as fabric, thread, elastics and other items.

loans.name: Hasmanny

texts.es:
Hasmany es soltero, no tiene hijos, vive en la casa de sus abuelos ocupando solo una habitación pequeña.
Actualmente, trabaja como chófer de minibus en el área urbana durante el día ya que por las noches va a estudiar a la Universidad y con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos.
El crédito lo requiere para cancelar pensiones universitarias ya que con lo que gana no puede cubrir ese pago.
El sueño de Hasmany es terminar su carrera y posteriormente poder independizarse para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hasmanny is single and does not have children. He lives in his grandparents' house, occupying only one small room.

Currently, he works as a minibus driver in the urban area during the day. At night he studies at the university, and with the little he earns he must cover the cost of food, education, and basic services.

He needs the loan to pay university fees, since with what he earns he cannot make the payment.

Hasmanny's dream is to finish his studies and then be able to become independent in order to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to pay university fees

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en una casa alquilada con sus padres y hermanos,ocupa solo una habitación pequeña, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja por mas de nueve horas al día en una empresa privada,y con lo que gana debe ayudar con los gastos familiares con el pago de servicios básicos y alimentación de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para empezar el negocio del comercio de ropa ya que desea mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Daniela es independizarse para tener mas comodidad y privacidad ya que actualmente cursa los últimos años en la universidad en la carrera de administración.
texts.en:
Daniela is single with no children and lives in a rented house with her parents and siblings where she just has a small room. The house is located in the Sopocachi area of the city of La Paz. Currently she works for more than 9 hours a day in a private firm and with what she earns she has to contribute to the family's living costs, paying for basic services and the family's food. 

Daniela needs the loan to start her business selling clothing since she wants to increase her income and improve her quality of life. Her dream is to become independent so she can have more comfort and privacy, since she is currently in her final years of her university degree course in administration.

loans.use: to have capital to sell clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to restock her store with various products.

loans.name: Merita

texts.es: Merita, de 34  años de edad, está casada con Ausberto y tiene 03 hijos de 14 , 12 y 06 años de edad respectivamente con quienes vive en su casa propia. Merita se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles de primera necesidad, para esto abrió una pequeña tienda en su hogar, donde acondicionó e implementó todos sus productos necesarios y solicitados por sus clientes a quienes atiende de manera amable y cordial y hasta el momento recibe ayuda de su esposo. Se inició hace 03 años comprando en pequeñas cantidades con su propio capital, y viendo que le daba resultados positivos decidió continuar y comprar en mayor cantidad para así satisfacer a todos sus clientes. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida de recibir un apoyo financiero que le permite seguir adelante con su negocio. Con el monto solicitado de 1300 nuevos soles comprará más productos comestibles como harina, leche, menestras, arroz, entre otros.
texts.en: Merita, 34 years old, is married to Ausberto and has 3 children aged 6, 12, and 14. She lives with them in her own house. Merita sells staple grocery items. For this she opened a small shop in her home, where she set up and put in all of the necessary items requested by her customers, on whom she waits in a friendly and cordial way. Up to now she has had her husband's help. She started 3 years ago, buying in small quantities with her own capital, and seeing that she got positive results, she decided to continue and to buy in greater quantity in order to satisfy her customers' needs. This is her first loan with Kiva, and she is thankful for receiving financial support that allows her to continue moving forward with her business. With the amount requested of 1300 nuevos soles, she will buy more grocery products such as flour, milk, vegetable soup, and rice, among others.

loans.use: to buy grocery products such as flour, milk, vegetable soup, and rice, among others

loans.name: Dúo Solidario San Cristobal Group

texts.es:
DUO SOLIDARIO SAN CRISTOBAL
Este dúo está conformado por Juana ella es originaria de San andres Itzapa y es madre de familia, ella se dedica a la venta de Ropa típica y vajillas de trastos, su producto lo trae desde la frontera de Mexico Y Guatemala(Tecun Uman)a cada cierto tiempo tiene que viajar a la frontera para poder comprar la mercadería que vende, por tal razón solicitan nuevamente otro crédito para poder seguir vendiendo y surtiendo su mercadería ya que es la fuente de ingresos para poder mantener a su familia les agradese su ayuda ya que de esa manera ella podrá seguir adelante en su negocio ya que por madio de el credito que le otorgaron ella pudo aumentar sus venta.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the "Duo Solidario San Cristobal" group. She is from San Andres Itzapa and is a parent. She sells traditional clothing and tableware. She brings her product from the border of Mexico and Guatemala (Tecun Uman).  Every so often she has to travel to the border so that she can buy the merchandise she sells. For this reason they are again asking for a loan so that she can continue selling and restocking merchandise, as it is the source of income that enables her to support her family.

She is grateful for your help as that way she will be able to keep moving forward with her business, as by means of the loan that she was granted she was able to increase her sales.

loans.use: To buy traditional clothing and to buy tableware.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install a sheet metal roof.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To build a room in his home

loans.name: Dúo Solidario Trabajadoras De Barcenas Group

texts.es: Dúo Solidario Trabajadoras de Barcenas este grupo esta conformado por la señora Francisca de 44 años de edad ella es casada y tiene 5 hijos, ella desde hace 15 años se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tortillas, asta la actualidad sus ventas han ido mejorando pero tiene la nesecidad de invertir un poco mas para generar un poco mas de ganancias ya que el sector donde ella vende hay mucha demanda de sus clientes es por eso que esta sikicitando este credito para la compra de maiz y leña para la elaboracion y venta de tortillas, espera que le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado para mejorar en su negocio.
texts.en:
Francisca  belongs to the Duo Solidario Trabajadoras de Barcenas, She is 44 years old and is married with 5 children. For the last 15 years she has been earning a living making and selling tortillas. Her sales have been continually improving but she needs to invest a bit more to generate more profits, since in the area where she works there is plenty of business from her clients. 

That is why she is asking for this loan to buy corn and firewood to make and sell tortillas. She hopes you will be able to help her with the loan she needs to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Clary

texts.es:
Clary, de 38 años, está casada y tiene 4 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Clary se dedica a la venta de comidas y realiza esta función en el frontis de su hogar en donde ha acondicionado un espacio cómodo para atender a sus clientes. Como todos los días, Clary sale muy temprano de su hogar y se dirige al mercado en busca de ingredientes e insumos frescos para así poder preparar los deliciosos platillos con los que deleita a sus clientes, su horario laboral se inicia por la tarde ofreciendo a la venta diferentes productos. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 3 años y durante este tiempo trabaja sola ya que por el momento no considera necesario la ayuda de ningún personal. También tiene un mototaxi que alquila diariamente. Le esta yendo muy bien y genera muy buenas ventas diarias y por tanto tiene buenos ingresos económicos los cuales utiliza para poder cubrir las principales necesidades de sus hijos, espera expandir su negocio y trabajar también vendiendo desayunos motivo por el cual se le hace necesario adquirir lo más pronto posible algunos artículos de calidad y otros accesorios que requiere en su cocina.
En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero que le permita seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Con el monto solicitado comprará ingredientes e insumos al por mayor como arroz, aceite, azúcar, fideos, tubérculos, huevos y condimentos para continuar preparando los alimentos que pone a la venta.
texts.en:
Thirty-eight year-old Clary is married and has 4 children. They live together in a house that she owns. 

Clary earns a living selling food. She works at the front of her home where she has set up a comfortable space where she can serve her customers. Every day, Clary leaves home very early in the morning to go to the market to buy fresh ingredients and supplies to use to prepare delicious dishes that delight her customers. In the afternoon she begins offering different products for sale. She has been doing this work for 3 years and has always worked alone because, for the moment, she doesn't think she needs any staff to help her. She also has a motorcycle taxi that she rents out daily. 

Things have been going very well and she is earning a good income from her daily sales which she uses to provide for her children's basic needs. She hopes to expand her business and also work selling breakfasts. This is why, as soon as possible, she needs to purchase some quality items and accessories for her kitchen. 

On this occasion she requests 500 Peruvian Nuevo Soles. She is very pleased to know that she will have financial support which will allow her to move forward. She also promises to make her payments on time.  


With the requested amount she will buy ingredients and supplies wholesale, such as rice, oil, sugar, noodles, tubers, eggs and seasonings to continue preparing the food that she sells.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, sugar, noodles, tubers, eggs and seasonings.

loans.name: Los Geranios Group

texts.es: El grupo “LOS GERANIOS”  es un grupo conformado por 06 socias laboriosas   quienes se encuentran pasando el 2 ciclo.  Crecencia tiene 38 años es conviviente con dos hijos educando. Hace 4 años implemento una pequeña bodega en su vivienda que se encuentra ubicada en una zona comercial. Años atrás se dedicaba a la venta de salchipapas en las afueras de su vivienda. De esta manera a podido apoyar a su esposo a mejorar su econimia familiar. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de una exhibidora para golosinas. una metas de las metas de Crecencia es agrandar su negocio. el grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado . Crecencia es la tercera del lado derecho viste buzo rojo.
texts.en:
The "Los Geranios" ["Geraniums"] group is composed of 6 hard-working partners who are now in their second lending cycle. Crecencia is 38 years old and lives with her two children who are in school. Four years ago she set up a small warehouse in her home, which is located in a commercial area. Some years ago she made a living selling salchipapas [pan-fried beef sausages and French fries] around her house. Through this she has been able to help her husband to improve their family economy.

She will use the loan to buy a display case for candy. One of the goals of Crecencia is to expand her business. The group thanks the Kiva investors for the loan. In the picture, Crecencia is the third from the right side, wearing red pants.

loans.use: To buy a display case

loans.name: Paskali

texts.en: Paskali is a 35-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been selling cassava flour for nine years. His store is located on a busy street. He farms to earn additional income. Paskali hopes to have his own farm one day. He is a good father who hopes to educate his children to the university level. His business goal is to own a food store in town. Paskali requests a loan to buy cassava flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour to sell.

loans.name: Zendere

texts.en:
Zendera is a 58-year-old carpentry shop, cafe, and quarry business owner in Kilifi, Kenya. She is a married woman who supports two adult children with the help of her spouse. Zendera has been in business for the last six years.

This marks her fourth time borrowing from KADET Ltd. She will use the requested loan to purchase timber and wood working tools for her workshop. She will use the profit from her additional sales to service her loan. She hopes to own several workshops in Kilifi County and hopes to employ many people in the future.

loans.use: to purchase timber and wood working tools for her workshop.

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en:
Mildred, 45 years old, is married to Barack and the mother of four children; she also supports two other children. A tailor in Kangemi for nine years now, she earns a monthly income of 19,000 shillings.

This will be Mildred's seventh loan from KADET LTD, with which she plans to buy materials for making 100 pieces of sofa set covers for sale. In the future, she wants to open a boutique and a bigger shop.

loans.use: To buy materials for making sofa set covers

loans.name: John

texts.en: This marks John's second loan after repaying his first loan fully. His business has grown and he has opened up a second business, a wood workshop. He will use this requested loan to stock timber in his workshop, and the proceeds will help to renovate his retail shop for expansion. John hopes to grow his two businesses in the future.

loans.use: to stock timber in his workshop.

loans.name: Ivan José

texts.es: Iván José , tiene la edad de  24 años, es soltero, y tiene 1 hijo que es su mayor prioridad. El quiere  comprar cerdos y su alimento.   Tiene varios años que se dedica esta actividad y quiere crecer y también desea que su finca sea muy productiva. En la actualidad tiene una porqueriza con cerdos pero quiere aumentar la producción. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. No  ha realizado otros préstamos en bancos estatales o Cooperativas, pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. El  también tiene el deseo de brindarle a su hijo la educación necesaria  para que sea en el futuro  persona preparada y pueda enfrentar de manera más fácil la vida.
texts.en: Iván José is 24 years old, single, and has one child, who is his first priority. He would like to purchase more pigs and feed. He has been working raising pigs for several years now and he wants to see his business grow and he wants his farm to be productive. He currently runs a pig farm but wants to increase production. This is his first loan he will receive from FUDECOSUR. He does not have any other loans with any state banks or cooperatives but FUDECOSUR was able to offer him a loan and one with a much lower interest rate. He also wants to give his child all the necessary education to be a well prepared person and to be able to achieve more in life in the future.

loans.use: purchase pigs and feed.

loans.name: Milagritos

texts.es:
Milagritos, tiene 23 años, está casada con Alejandro y tiene un hijo de 02 años de edad con quien vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo. Lía se dedica a la venta de verduras por eso implemento una pequeña tienda en el frontis de su hogar, su negocio es muy concurrida por sus clientes por ser el único lugar en su localidad en donde ofrece está variedad de productos. Lleva ya 05 años en esta actividad y lo realiza sola, al principio sentía que nunca iba a poder tener un negocio en su propia casa porque anteriormente vendía golosinas de manera ambulatoria por todas las calles de la ciudad, pero no conseguía vender mucho y se sentía frustrada, esa situación a cambiado y ahora se siente tranquila con su negocio. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y hacerlos reír, considera que lo más difícil es tener que levantarse muy temprano para atender, sin embargo sabe que eso le traerá buenos resultados económicos. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida de recibir un apoyo financiero que le permite seguir adelante con su negocio.
Con el monto solicitado 1000 nuevos soles comprará verduras al por mayor tales como tomates,lechugas,plátanos, entre otros.
texts.en:
Milagritos is 23 years old. She is married to Alejandro and has a child of two, who lives in her home together with her husband. She makes a living from the sale of vegetables, which she sells from a small shop in front of her home. Her business is very busy, since it is the only place in her town where such a variety of produce is sold. She has been doing this for 5 years and by herself. At first she felt that she would never be able to have her own business in her home. She used to sell candy by peddling it in all the streets of town, but she did not manage to sell much and felt frustrated.

This situation has now changed and she feels calm with her business. What she likes best from her business is to talk to her customers and to make them laugh. She considers that the hardest part from it is to have to wake up very early to tend to it. However, she knows that by doing it, it will bring her good economic benefits.

This is her first loan with Kiva and she feels grateful to receive financial support, which will help her move forward with her business.

With the requested amount of 1000 nuevos soles she will buy vegetables wholesale, such as tomatoes, lettuce, and bananas, among others.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes, lettuce, bananas and other vegetables

loans.name: Dúo Solidario Mujeres Solidarias Group

texts.es:
DÚO SOLIDARIO MUJERES SOLIDARIAS
Rosa María,de 37 años de edad y tiene 4 hijos que viven aun con ella, es casada y se dedica a su tienda que está ubicada en su casa desde hace 8 meses, también se dedica a la elaboración de comales pero ella solicita este crédito para invertir en su tienda(para la compra de productos de granos basicos) ya que gracias a el credito anterior ella puso su tienda y gracias a Dios poco a poco sigue adelante y espera que le ayuden nuevamente ya que le falta mucho para surtir su tienda porque hay personas que le llegan a comprar y a beses ella no tiene lo que sus clientes le piden o a veces se terminan por eso necesita más capital ya que le faltan algunos productos también esperan que esta vez no se atrase en su crédito ya que espera que le ayuden.
texts.en: Rosa María is 37 years old, she has four children who still live with her, she is married, and she runs a store from her house. She has been operating for 8 months now and she also makes comales (similar to a tortilla). She is applying for this loan in order to invest in her store (so she can purchase products like basic grains) and thanks to her previous loan she was able to even start her business, and thanks to God, little by little she has been pushing forward. She hopes that a new loan will help her out again because she is low on stock and there are times when people come to her store to purchase items but she doesn't have what they need. And so she needs more working capital so she can restock her shelves and hopes that this time she will not be late on any repayments and she hopes that you feel the urge to help.

loans.use: purchase basic necessities.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Jesus Mi Salvador Group

texts.es: El grupo “JESUS MI SALVADOR” es un grupo conformado por 05 socios quienes día tras día luchan para mejorar su economía familiar. Emilio tiene 70 años es casado hace 20 años se dedica al comercio de productos agrícola y de la misma manera brinda servicios de transporte público desde muy joven. El préstamo lo invertirá en la reparación de su carro. Su mayor deseo es mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposa y la de él. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo. Emilio es la primera persona parada en el lado izquierdo.
texts.en:
The Jesús Mi Salvador group is comprised of five members who work day after day, struggling to improve the family finances.

Emilio, age 70, has been married for 20 years.  He sells agricultural products, and he has been providing public transportation services since he was very young.

He will use the loan to repair his car.  His biggest wish is to improve his quality of life and that of his wife.

The group is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the loan.

Emilio is the first person standing on the left side.

loans.use: to repair his car.

loans.name: Punahuel Group

texts.es: Leyla, que se ubica al fondo izquierdo de la fotografía aparece riendo, pertenece al Banco Comunal Punahuel que se encuentra ubicado en Castro, comuna de la provincia de Chiloé X región de Los Lagos. En este Banco los socios venden ropa usada, hacen comida y la venden en la feria, y Leyla, tiene un taller de costura, que comenzó hace muchos años, casi toda su vida ya que aprendió de su madre quien también hacia costuras. Leyla comenzó además a coser a máquina cuando en un concurso se gano la máquina de coser. Ocupará el préstamo en comprar telas para hacer cortinas ya que tiene muchas clientas que le han solicitado cortinas, así que tiene asegurada la compra de éstas, por lo cual sabe que le irá muy bien. Lo que más le ha gustado de trabajar con Fondo Esperanza es el hecho de que toda la comunidad se ayuda para salir adelante, y todo su grupo tiene ganas de surgir.
texts.en: Leyla, who can be seen laughing at the back left of the photo, belongs to the communal bank "Punahuel," which is located in Castro, a commune of the Chiloé Province in the Los Lagos Region. In this communal bank, the members sell used clothing and they make food to sell at fairs. Leyla has a sewing workshop that she began many years ago--in fact which she had for almost her entire life--considering that she learned from her mother who also used to sew. Leyla also began machine sewing when she won a sewing machine in a competition. She will use this loan to buy fabric to sew curtains since many customers have asked her for them, and having their purchase assured, she knows that this will go very well for her. What she has liked most about working with Fondo Esperanza is that the entire community helps each other to move forward and that the whole group has a desire to emerge and develop.

loans.use: to buy fabric to sew curtains.

loans.name: Elvia

texts.es:
La Sra. Elvia es originaria de la cd. de San Luis Potosi, pero llego a la cd. de Piedras Negras de la mano de sus papás cuando tenía solamente 6 años, es una persona confiable, respetuosa, amigable, trabaja en una empresa muy reconocida en esta cd. desde hace 12 años, menciona que se siente muy agusto y satisfecha pues le gusta mucho su trabajo y lo disfruta a diario, es madre soltera su hija es ya toda una mujercita de la cuál se siente muy orgullosa y es por eso que trabaja mucho para que así a ella no le haga falta nunca nada, mientras ella estudia.
La Sra Elvia vive en casa de sus papás, tiene su casa  propia y la renta solo que los renteros que tenía se la dejaron muy dañada, es por eso que pide apoyo através de KIVA para poder arreglarla, hacerle detalles exteriores para que se vea bonita, pues en estos momentos no luce como ella quisiera y no quiere que los proximos renteros no la vean en esas circunstancias si no se sientan cómodos al habitarla y no reciba ninguna queja de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Elvia's from the city of San Luis Potosí but she arrived in Piedras Negras with her parents when she was only six years old.  She's a trustworthy, respectful, and friendly person.

She has worked for 12 years for a very well-known business in this city.  She says she's very comfortable and satisfied because she likes her job a lot and enjoys it every day.

She's the single mother of a daughter who's already a young woman of whom she's very proud.  This is why she works a lot, so she never lacks for anything while she's attending school.

Elvia lives in her parents' house.  She has her own house and rents it, but the tenants she had left it with a lot of damage.  This is why she's requesting a Kiva loan to be able to fix it up and make some exterior repairs so it looks good.  It doesn't make the impression she would like it to and she doesn't want the next tenants to see it in this condition.  If they do, they might not feel comfortable living there and she doesn't want to receive any complaints about her house.

loans.use: to remodel the outside of her house

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 35 años, está casada y vive en su casa propia junto su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Rosa se dedica a la venta de comidas y refrescos por las mañanas en un puesto en el mercado de la ciudad.
